numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I noticed a fact about the leagues.
3. In every league except MLB, a majority of the players are colored people.
4. In every league, colored people are less than 50 percent of the head coaches.
5. I wonder why MLB does not have a majority of colored players.
6. I wonder why colored people are not a majority of head coaches in any league.
9. This graph impacts my community positively.
11. The graph shows that in most leagues a majority of players are colored people.
12. I conclude that there is no discrimination in sports.
13. This graph impacts my community negatively.
15. The graph implies that in every league colored people are not a majority of head coaches.
16. The title for this graph is: "Majority of non-colored head coaches in leagues, but a majority of colored players in most leagues, is there a reason?"
